author: Chaunu
title: L'actualit√© vue par Chaunu : Laurent Wauquiez propose d'enfermer les OQTF √† Saint-Pierre-et-Miquelon
text:
L‚Äôactualit√© vue par Chaunu : Laurent Wauquiez propose d‚Äôenfermer les OQTF √† Saint-Pierre-et-Miquelon
Ce jeudi 10 avril, Chaunu s‚Äôest inspir√© de la derni√®re proposition du d√©put√© de Haute-Loire, en comp√©tition avec Bruno Retailleau pour d√©crocher la pr√©sidence du parti de droite Les R√©publicains.

author: A24COM
title: Colaboradores +50: una tendencia que crece y hace m√°s inclusivo el √°mbito laboral
text:
En este √∫ltimo tiempo venimos observando que cada vez m√°s empresas est√°n revalorizando los talentos mayores a los 50 a√±os de edad.
Le√© tambi√©n Estiman que la producci√≥n agr√≠cola 2023/24 crecer√° cerca de 40% Esto fue impulsado por fen√≥menos como la Gran Renuncia, que tuvo su pico a finales del 2021 y continu√≥ en el 2022, con una gran masa laboral en todo el mundo cambiando de empleo.
Es necesario aclarar que la segregaci√≥n por edad, llamada edadismo, est√° m√°s controlada en ciertos pa√≠ses que por ley proh√≠ben este tipo de discriminaci√≥n.
Por ejemplo, no se permite solicitar la edad en los curriculum vitae o en formularios de postulaciones. Por lo tanto, la edad no es un motivo de exclusi√≥n.
¬øPor qu√© hoy se revaloriza a los colaboradores +50? Estudios realizados por Adecco revelaron que el salario es ‚Äúuna herramienta de atracci√≥n, pero no de fidelizaci√≥n‚Äù.
El sueldo es la principal raz√≥n por la que los trabajadores de todo el mundo cambian de trabajo.
El 45% de los trabajadores que dicen que dejar√°n su trabajo en los pr√≥ximos 12 meses lo har√°n para conseguir un salario superior.
Sin embargo, cuando los trabajadores est√°n comprometidos y quieren permanecer en su actual empresa, el salario pierde importancia, bajando al sexto lugar en el orden de prioridades.
Al respecto, el HR Manager y Coach de empresas, Miguel Jos√©, afirm√≥: ‚ÄúActualmente, entre las principales causas de rotaci√≥n encontramos, la b√∫squeda de un mayor equilibrio entre el trabajo y la vida personal, la insatisfacci√≥n con las condiciones laborales, la reevaluaci√≥n de las prioridades personales, y la b√∫squeda de oportunidades m√°s alineadas con sus valores y metas‚Äù.
‚ÄúEste fen√≥meno ha llevado a que las empresas reconsideren sus estrategias de contrataci√≥n y fidelizaci√≥n de talento‚Äù, puntualiz√≥ el director de la consultora con sede en Florida, USA Doko Consulting.
Para el experto, a partir de lo anterior, ‚Äútoma una vital relevancia contar con una cultura organizacional inclusiva y diversa que permita reivindicar la edad como un valor positivo‚Äù.
En ese sentido, Jos√© recomend√≥ hacer una introspecci√≥n y revisar ciertos puntos concretos para conocer si nuestra empresa est√° siendo atractiva al mercado actual de talentos, entre ellos:
‚Ä¢Pol√≠ticas y procesos internos: Las pol√≠ticas y documentos internos de la empresa, como manuales de inducci√≥n, c√≥digos de conducta y pol√≠ticas de selecci√≥n, en este √∫ltimo punto es muy importante revisar las pr√°cticas de contrataci√≥n para asegurarse de que est√©n libres de sesgos y prejuicios.
‚Ä¢Encuestas an√≥nimas: Realizar encuestas an√≥nimas para obtener informaci√≥n de los colaboradores sobre la cultura de la empresa sobre la percepci√≥n de inclusi√≥n y diversidad, as√≠ como la existencia de prejuicios o discriminaci√≥n en el lugar de trabajo.
‚Ä¢Mapeo de datos: Analizar las causas de la rotaci√≥n de diferentes grupos demogr√°ficos en todos los niveles de la empresa, desde empleados de nivel inicial hasta la alta direcci√≥n.
‚Ä¢Participaci√≥n en eventos y redes: Observar la participaci√≥n de la empresa en eventos y redes relacionadas con la diversidad e inclusi√≥n, esto demuestra un compromiso activo.
‚Ä¢Capacitaci√≥n: Evaluar la existencia de programas de capacitaci√≥n, que incluyen talleres, seminarios y otras formaciones para l√≠deres y colaboradores, que aborden la conciencia y el conocimiento en diversidad e inclusi√≥n.
‚Ä¢Liderazgo y Participaci√≥n de la Alta Direcci√≥n: Observar el compromiso de la alta direcci√≥n con la diversidad e inclusi√≥n, sabiendo que su participaci√≥n activa implica un mensaje fuerte al resto de la organizaci√≥n.
‚ÄúHacer este diagn√≥stico -adem√°s de permitirnos revisar nuestra cultura organizacional- nos ayudar√° a conocer nuestra actual propuesta de valor para todos nuestros colaboradores actuales y futuros, siendo conscientes del nuevo mapa y escenario demogr√°fico de talentos que est√°n en el mercado‚Äù, resalt√≥ Miguel Jos√©.
Y consider√≥ que ‚Äúlo que hoy vivimos no es una escasez de talentos porque siempre hay talentos‚Äù.
‚ÄúLa diferencia como empresa estar√° entonces en el poder de atracci√≥n y fidelizaci√≥n de una cultura empresarial diversa e inclusiva con pol√≠ticas de gesti√≥n de la diversidad que ponga en el centro el bienestar de las personas‚Äù, ampli√≥ el consultor.
Beneficios de contratar a personas +50 ‚Ä¢Diversidad generacional: La interacci√≥n entre las diferentes generaciones a nivel individual y equipos de trabajo, generan m√∫ltiples miradas y una extraordinaria riqueza de oportunidades, fundamental para un entorno cambiante.
‚Ä¢Sostenibilidad del negocio: Si la diversidad est√° en nuestros clientes, que est√© en nuestros colaboradores y equipos es esencial para la sostenibilidad de la organizaci√≥n.
‚Ä¢Conocimiento y experiencia: A√±os de conocimientos especializados y experiencia aplicada sobre ciertas tem√°ticas.
‚Ä¢Criterios y toma de decisiones: La experiencia puede ser valiosa para resolver problemas, tomar decisiones informadas y contribuir al √©xito general de la empresa.
‚Ä¢Mentor√≠a y desarrollo: Incentivar espacios de mentor√≠a y transferencia de habilidades y conocimientos para el desarrollo profesional de los miembros m√°s j√≥venes del equipo.
‚Ä¢Contribuye a la imagen de marca empleadora: Contratar y fidelizar empleados mayores puede mejorar la imagen empresarial, mostrando un compromiso con la diversidad y la inclusi√≥n.
‚Ä¢Acelera los cambios al fomentar la creatividad, la innovaci√≥n, la adaptabilidad y entender que m√°s miradas generan mejores productos o servicios.
En resumen, parece entonces que hoy lo √∫nico ‚Äúviejo‚Äù son los modelos mentales que limitan a los talentos por la edad, para esos casos existen consultoras expertas en acompa√±ar a Directorios y Managers en estos cambios fomentando la pluralidad con pr√°cticas de diversidad e inclusi√≥n.
Para que esto no quede en una expresi√≥n de deseo, y dejemos de perdernos excelentes profesionales, es fundamental que no sea un proceso m√°s del √°rea de personas o capital humano.
La invitaci√≥n es que todos los que formamos parte de una organizaci√≥n, especialmente la alta direcci√≥n, seamos protagonistas del cambio, erradicando el edadismo y ampliando nuestras posibilidades.

title: Xiaomi 15 Review: Premium Performance In A Sleek Design | Flipboard
text:

author: yahoo
title: Olivia Rodrigo hands out free morning-after pills, condoms at Missouri show. How she's championing reproductive health care on tour.
text:
Yahoo Music Olivia Rodrigo hands out free morning-after pills, condoms at Missouri show. How she's championing reproductive health care on tour. Neia Balao ¬∑ Internet Culture Reporter Updated March 14, 2024 at 9:23 PM ¬∑ 5 min read 249 Olivia Rodrigo during the "Guts" world tour at Acrisure Arena in Palm Springs, Calif., in February.
Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later. More content below
During her ‚ÄúGuts‚Äù world tour stop in St. Louis, Mo., on March 13, Olivia Rodrigo partnered with the Missouri Abortion Fund to distribute condoms and boxes of Julie , a brand of the morning-after pill, to concertgoers.
‚ÄúThank you to @oliviarodrigo for allowing us to table at your STL GUTS world tour stop! It‚Äôs brutal out here in Missouri!‚Äù the Missouri Abortion Fund posted on Instagram, referencing a song lyric from Rodrigo‚Äôs debut album, Sour .
View this post on Instagram
A post shared by Missouri Abortion Fund (@moabortionfund)
Kaiya Olsen, 26, who attended the St. Louis show on Tuesday, told Yahoo Entertainment that she and her friend visited the Missouri Abortion Fund booth at the show.
It‚Äôs brutal out here in Missouri, but we are here for abortion access and hand out Plan B with @TextRightByYou https://t.co/Rd7fc0b1xG
‚Äî Missouri Abortion Fund (@MOAbortionFund) March 13, 2024
‚ÄúWe visited the table, chatted with the representatives and collected a few stickers and the free Plan B,‚Äù Olsen said. ‚ÄúI love seeing Olivia stand up for what she believes in, and it‚Äôs refreshing to see a pop star quite literally putting her money where her mouth is! I think this instance is setting the tone for fans and celebrities alike, actions speak louder than words.‚Äù
Mads Ritter, 25, also visited the booth at the St. Louis concert.
‚ÄúI love that [Rodrigo] is giving out contraceptives at a concert and that she supports women's rights so outwardly,‚Äù Ritter, a registered nurse, told Yahoo Entertainment. ‚ÄúAs a nurse and an abortion advocate, I love that she‚Äôs doing this.‚Äù
How Olivia Rodrigo is supporting women‚Äôs reproductive health care in other ways This isn‚Äôt the only way Rodrigo is championing women‚Äôs reproductive health care on tour.
The ‚ÄúVampire‚Äù singer launched Fund 4 Good , a global initiative supporting nonprofits that prioritizes reproductive rights as well as girls‚Äô education and the prevention of gender-based violence, in collaboration with her ‚ÄúGuts‚Äù world tour.
At each of Rodrigo‚Äôs stops during her North American tour, there is a designated National Network of Abortion Funds booth set up with organization representatives who can further educate fans on how to access local care. On Instagram, where Rodrigo has more than 36 million followers, she also spotlights nonprofit organizations specific to the city she‚Äôs performing in ahead of every show.
A representative for Rodrigo did not immediately respond to Yahoo Entertainment‚Äôs request for comment.
Julie, a progestin‚Äëonly emergency contraception product, which was launched in 2022 ‚Äúto rewrite the morning-after experience for a new generation,‚Äù said in a statement obtained by Yahoo Entertainment that the company was ‚Äúthankful for artists like Olivia Rodrigo and initiatives like the Missouri Abortion Fund who share our mission‚Äù to make emergency contraceptives more accessible.
Yahoo Entertainment reached out to the Missouri Abortion Fund for comment but did not immediately receive a response.
Why Missouri? When a draft of the Supreme Court‚Äôs opinion around the Dobbs v. Jackson Women‚Äôs Health Organization decision leaked in May 2022, Rodrigo paused her Washington, D.C., concert to defend abortion rights.
"Our bodies should never be in the hands of politicians,‚Äù Rodrigo told the crowd during her May 4, 2022, ‚ÄúSour‚Äù tour stop. ‚ÄúI hope we can raise our voices to protect our right to have a safe abortion, which is a right that so many people before us have worked so hard to get.‚Äù
üí¨ | ‚ÄúOur bodies should never be in the hands of politicians, i hope we can raise our voices to protect our right, to have a safe abortion, which is a right that so many people before us have worked so hard to get.‚Äù
‚Äî Olivia tonight at #SOURTOURdc !
https://t.co/PSgWd2DlNN
‚Äî Olivia Rodrigo Daily (@DailyRodrigo) May 5, 2022
Following the Supreme Court‚Äôs decision in Dobbs v. Jackson Women‚Äôs Health Organization , which overturned Roe v. Wade and Planned Parenthood v. Casey on June 24, 2022, Missouri was among a handful of states that saw its previously unconstitutional anti-abortion laws, also known as ‚Äútrigger‚Äù laws , go into effect.
Missouri became the first state to ban abortion when Roe v. Wade was overturned.
While fans applauded Rodrigo for taking a stand by supplying contraception to her audience, her move was not without criticism . ‚ÄúIt may be too soon to assess the move‚Äôs larger impact,‚Äù Lauren Wright, an associate research scholar and lecturer in politics and public affairs at Princeton University, told Yahoo Entertainment.
‚ÄúI think the main result is definitely attention-getting, which is smart for the artist because it brings attention to her tour, and it certainly becomes a popular news story during election season, again perhaps exciting the left and maybe angering the right. Celebrities are great at getting attention and drawing the attention of their fans to certain issues,‚Äù Wright added.
‚ÄúMost people have already formed solid views about abortion and reproductive-health related issues,‚Äù she explained. ‚ÄúIf it has any impact, it might energize Democrats and liberal-leaning voters and alienate or anger Republicans and conservative-leaning voters.‚Äù
That‚Äôs not to say Rodrigo‚Äôs activism was ineffective.
Dr. Karen Tang is a board-certified gynecologist and author of the forthcoming book It‚Äôs Not Hysteria: Everything You Need to Know About Your Reproductive Health (But Were Never Told) . She told Yahoo Entertainment that she was ‚Äúthrilled‚Äù to learn that Rodrigo distributed emergency contraceptives, especially in a state that prohibits abortions.
‚ÄúBoth condoms and emergency contraceptives like Julie or Plan B are available over the counter, but cost or access can always be an issue. Especially in states where strict abortion bans are in place, anything that increases access to effective birth control and helps to prevent unwanted pregnancies is a positive thing,‚Äù Tang said.
Addressing criticism that ‚Äúgiving out condoms or emergency contraception would ‚Äòencourage promiscuity,‚Äô‚Äù she defended Rodrigo‚Äôs move.
‚ÄúI'd refer them to the data that accurate sex education and resources do not increase sexual activity in people who aren't already sexually active ‚Äî but they do decrease both STIs and unplanned pregnancies in those who are,‚Äù Tang explained.
View comments

author: advikasharma1234
title: Wonder Xtreme | High-Performance Portland Pozzolana Cement - Wonder Cement
text:
Wonder Cement Xtreme: Crafted in a leading plant, it yields high-performance concrete, ensuring strength and durability while protecting structures from cracks, moisture, and ageing.
Years of research, careful listening to customer feedback, and use of premium raw materials, have gone into the creation of this specially formulated cement, that offers a great finish while taking on the rough and tough. Wonder Cement Xtreme creates high-performance concrete and is ideal for individual house-builders who are looking for the best.

author: Danilo Lavieri
title: Corinthians arranca empate contra o Gr√™mio com o erro escandaloso do juiz
text:
S√≥ para assinantes Assine UOL Opini√£o Esporte Corinthians arranca empate contra o Gr√™mio com o erro escandaloso do juiz Danilo Lavieri Colunista do UOL 25/07/2024 22h05
Siga o UOL Esporte no O Corinthians conseguiu arrancar o empate com o Gr√™mio com direito a gola√ßo do Garro, mas o que vai ficar marcado por todo o Brasileir√£o foi o p√™nalti escandaloso marcado a favor da equipe quando o jogo ainda estava 1 a 0 para a equipe ga√∫cha.
O erro seria grave de qualquer jeito, mas a propor√ß√£o dele aumenta por causa do confronto direto que os times travam na parte de baixo da tabela. Pontos como esse podem fazer a diferen√ßa para n√£o cair l√° na frente.
√â inacredit√°vel que o VAR tenha entendido que Kanneman teve o impacto o suficiente para derrubar Romero. N√£o d√° para saber o que √© pior. O √°rbitro de v√≠deo Pablo Ramon Gon√ßalves Pinheiro ser Fifa e ter indicado a revis√£o ou o juiz de campo Alex Gomes Stefano ter aceitado a recomenda√ß√£o.
Mauro Cezar
P√™nalti '√† brasileira' em Itaquera ajuda Corinthians
Juca Kfouri
Corinthians e Gr√™mio estacionam com empate
Jamil Chade
Guerras barram o sonho de despolitizar Olimp√≠adas
Dem√©trio Vecchioli
Brasil descobre ter uma das melhores do mundo no gol
√â por p√™naltis como esse que os jogadores do Brasileir√£o seguem se jogando a qualquer contato, tornando o jogo ainda mais impratic√°vel. Qualquer toque, os atletas se atiram no ch√£o.
Os jogadores de outros times que estavam assistindo ao jogo v√£o entender que na pr√≥xima vez que entrarem em campo poder√£o tentar cavar faltas como essa.
E n√£o teremos novidade. Hoje o Gr√™mio vai reclamar, vai espernear, vai convocar coletiva e mandar carta para a CBF. Os dirigentes do Corinthians v√£o silenciar. Na pr√≥xima rodada, √© bem prov√°vel que os pap√©is se invertam.
Por que √© assim que a gente funciona em um lugar que a prioridade n√£o √© melhorar a qualidade da arbitragem, mas levar vantagem.
Opini√£o Texto em que o autor apresenta e defende suas ideias e opini√µes, a partir da interpreta√ß√£o de fatos e dados.
** Este texto n√£o reflete, necessariamente, a opini√£o do UOL.
